title: Crystal Caution List | Crystals Rock
description: Use the Crystal Caution List by Ashley Leavy, from the Love and Light School of Crystal Therapy, to see if a crystal is safe to use.

This is not a complete list and Ashley advises to also check the [Mindat ](https://www.mindat.org/)website.
